sentences.sContent: The Coca-Cola bottle is one of the classic designs of the last century.
sentences.sCn: 可口可乐瓶是上个世纪的经典设计之一。

sentences.sContent: ...The classic Greek tragedies of the fifth century...
...a teacher is handing a classic literature book to a student...
...It should be generally acknowledged that classic literature plays a significant role not only in preserving the essence of great minds but also in enhancing the quality of one’s life...

synos.tran: 经典的；古典的，传统的；最优秀的
名著；经典著作；大艺术家

words.tran: 古典的；经典的；传统的；第一流的
仿古典风格；崇尚古典风格

trans.tranCn: 最优秀的，典型的，标准的；传统式样的，典雅的
trans.tranOther: having all the features that are typical or expected of a particular thing or situation

trans.tranCn: 文学名著， 经典作品， 杰作； 优秀的典范； 古典文学， 古典语文研究
trans.tranOther: a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time
